title: Salesfusion
description: Salesfusion provides a robust Web Services API designed to help you connect your marketing automation system and lead generation processes to a variety of custom applications and off-the shelf solutions. Outside of our standard CRM integrations, our clients have used our REST API/Web Services to build connections between marketing and sales. From custom & legacy CRM systems such as Siebel, to building connections to CMS, ERP and commerce apps, our API uses a variety of industry standards and pre-defined API calls.
